com.jmr.wrapper.common.sql

Class JDBCDatabase

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.jmr.wrapper.common.sql.JDBCDatabase
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IDatabase

    public class JDBCDatabase
extends java.lang.Object
implements IDatabase
    Networking Library JDBCDatabase.java Purpose: Connects to a database through the JBDC driver and allows your to perform queries.
    Version:
    1.0 7/19/2014
    Author:
    Jon R (Baseball435)

      Connects to a database.

    • Constructor Detail

      • JDBCDatabase

        public JDBCDatabase(java.lang.String url,
                    java.lang.String databaseName,
                    java.lang.String username,
                    java.lang.String password)
             throws java.lang.InstantiationException,
                    java.lang.IllegalAccessException,
                    java.lang.ClassNotFoundException,
                    NNDatabaseCantConnect
        Connects to a database.
        Parameters:
        url - The link to the database.
        databaseName - The database name.
        username - The username to connect to the database.
        password - The password to connect to the database.
        Throws:
        java.lang.InstantiationException
        java.lang.IllegalAccessException
        java.lang.ClassNotFoundException - Thrown when JBDC driver not found.
        NNDatabaseCantConnect - Thrown when can't connect to the database.
        java.sql.SQLException
